name: Jaguar I-PACE Concept | Virtual Reality Experience
description: Discover Jaguar I-PACE Concept - a preview of our first all-electric performance SUV - in a fully interactive Virtual Reality experience. HTC Vive customers can now explore the design and engineering stories behind I-PACE Concept through a blend of cinematics and immersive VR technology.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.6Ghz i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.6Ghz i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
